stadium.name: The High-Pass Pitch
stadium.description: A field built at a breathtaking altitude in a fortified mountain pass. The air is painfully thin, and the weather is dangerously unpredictable.

stats.pregame_ritual: Tying a small, hand-carved wooden bird to their gear.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Whispering a secret fear to the Trollball before the game.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Exchanging well-wishes with their direct opponent before the game starts.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.

Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.

stadium.name: The Sinking Field
stadium.description: A notoriously poorly-maintained stadium built on reclaimed marshland. The ground is unstable, often waterlogged, and sections of the stands are known to collapse.

stats.pregame_ritual: Seeing who on the team can belch the loudest.
Meditating silently in the corner of the locker room.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Insisting on being the last player to leave the locker room.
Daring a teammate to eat a live worm.
Thanking their armor for the protection it's about to offer.
Counting the number of clouds in the sky.
Tapping each piece of their armor in a specific sequence.
Insisting on being the last player to leave the locker room.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.
Meditating silently in the corner of the locker room.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è LIVE FROM THE HIGH-PASS PITCH! üèîÔ∏è

**Gooooood evening, sports fans, deviants, and violence enthusiasts!** Nok the Corrupter here, coming to you LIVE on the spectral frequency, and have I got a treat for you tonight! We have ascended‚Äîquite literally‚Äîto the dizzying, oxygen-deprived heights of Oread's Summit to watch the **Oread's Summit Tamers** defend their rocky fortress against the greatest team to ever grace the pitch, the pride of the swamp, **THE EBON GATE CORRUPTORS!** üñ§üíö

Folks, the air up here is thinner than the plot of one of Blair Thorne's romance novels! You can barely breathe, let alone run, but that just makes the inevitable asphyxiation all the more exciting! The Tamers are looking smug in their home territory. I spotted **Zadoc Wyatan** sharing a "ceremonial non-alcoholic grog" with the team. Non-alcoholic?! ü§¢ That is an affront to the sport! You can't smash skulls with a clear head! Contrast that with the pure focus of the Corruptors! **Bullion Iglesias** is in the corner, meditating silently, visualizing the sounds of bones snapping. That is a professional right there!

I‚Äôve got my eye on **Olnek Vizzone** too, clapping his hands a prime number of times. I don‚Äôt know what a prime number is, but if it helps him wield that sickle, I‚Äôm all for it! The Corruptors are here to prove that mud is thicker than mountain air, and that no amount of fancy Prismatic Troupe glitter can hide the bruise of a well-placed mace! **Let‚Äôs get ready to RUUUUUMBLE!** üîîüî®
postGame:
# üèÅ POST-GAME REPORT: CORRUPTORS CONQUER THE PEAK! üèÅ

**CAN YOU BELIEVE IT?!** ü§© What a massacre! What a clinic! What a glorious display of athletic dominance! The final whistle has blown, the snow is stained red, and the score board tells the truth that the "Heroes" of this realm try to hide! **The Ebon Gate Corruptors: 10! The Oread's Summit Tamers: 2!** A landslide victory for the bad guys! HA HA HA!

The match started off looking grim, folks, I won't lie to you. The altitude seemed to be getting to my beautiful Corruptors early on. The Tamers came out swinging their weapons like they actually meant it! **Clippard Burr** nearly took **Napoleon Anzovin's** head off right out of the gate, and **Saloma Talich** put **Smith Syst** in the dirt! It was looking like a hospital visit for the away team before they even touched the ball! 

But you cannot keep a Corruptor down! **As Utter**, that beautiful brute, ignored the carnage around him, grabbed that leather troll head, and fired a rocket from Center Field! **GOAL!** First blood on the scoreboard for Ebon Gate! üéØ The Tamers responded quickly, I'll give them that‚Äî**Saloma Talich** managed to tie it up at 2-2 with a lucky shot, but that was the last time the home team would taste joy tonight!

The violence escalated quickly in the midfield! **Ahasuerus An** took revenge for the team, smashing **Saloma Talich** into the permafrost! **Edme Virgil** retaliated by taking out **Olnek Vizzone**, and **Zadoc Wyatan** dropped **As Utter**. Bodies were flying everywhere! The healers were working overtime! It was chaos! It was beautiful! It was TROLLBALL!

As we moved into the second half, the Corruptors decided they were done playing nice. **Napoleon Anzovin**, fresh from the healer's tent and probably still bleeding, launched a shot from the Home 2-Point line! **BOOM!** 4-2! The Tamers started to panic! Their "luck" ran out faster than a goblin in a library!

Then came the deluge! **Ahasuerus An**, who had already proven their worth in a fight, showed they have the range too! Another shot from the 2-Point line! **SWISH!** 6-2! The Tamers were reeling! They tried to fight back, with **Kass Fogel** putting **Judi Carrington** down for a nap, but the Corruptors just kept getting up!

Speaking of **Judi Carrington**, you can't keep a sea-shanty singer down for long! Once revived, Judi grabbed the ball and fired from Center Field! **8-2!** At this point, Kython and his Prismatic circus should just pack up their tent and go home! The Summit has been Tamed by the swamp!

The Tamers got nasty in the final minutes, clearly frustrated by their own incompetence. **Kass Fogel**, **Swamy Ahasuerus**, and **Alwyn Wandy** went on a rampage, injuring **Amedeo Bari**, **Simsar Carrelli**, and **Ahasuerus An**. But it didn't matter! The points were already on the board!

And just to rub salt in the wound, **As Utter** capped off the night with ONE MORE GOAL from Center Field! **10-2!** A double-digit demolition! The Corruptors walked into the enemy's house, drank their air, beat up their players, and took the 'W' home to the Sinking Field!

So take note, "Heroes" of Osterra! Sir Tanos can keep his cursed sword, and Artorias can keep his Fey friends. Tonight, the glory belongs to the **Ebon Gate Corruptors**! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off with a smile on my face and a song in my black heart! **GOODNIGHT OSTERRA!** üòàüéôÔ∏è
